data.text: @Powflip @GDIBoogie I am sorry to hear of your beloved grandmotherâ€™s passing. May she rest in peace and is in good care Upstairs. BUT she lives on in your heart and memories. 💚🙏
@GDIBoogie I'm sorry to hear this. She live a long life, and it sounds like a very full one as well. Peace to her.
@Octo33 Yeah my actual grandma, my patron granny passed away last year :(
@GDIBoogie The one that visited you at the Casino???...im so sad to hear this. Im sorry....Rest in Peace.
